spell_tooltip.description:
Shields you in flame, absorbing 1.9 million damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take 16,381 Fire damage.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by 10%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by 2%, up to 10% for 8 sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by 60 sec.
Gain a shield that absorbs 6% of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Blink.
Reduces magic damage taken by 4%.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.

Draw power from within, dealing 281,177 Arcane damage over 3.2 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by 12 sec over 3.2 sec.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec. Effect negated by long distance or death.
While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by 4 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by 10 sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer when you return to your original location.
Teleports you 20 yds forward, unless something is in the way. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.
Causes an explosion around yourself, dealing 63,225 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds, knocking them back, and reducing movement speed by 80% for 6 sec.
Increases Critical Strike chance by 2%.
Enemies in a cone in front of you take 76,632 Fire damage and are disoriented for 4 sec. Damage will cancel the effect.
Increases Haste by 2%.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional 10%.
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 40% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.
Frost Nova now has 2 charges.
Casting Clearcasting Arcane Missiles reduces the cooldown of your loss of control abilities by 2 sec.

Makes you invisible and untargetable for 20 sec, removing all threat. Any action taken cancels this effect.

You take 60% reduced damage while invisible and for 3 sec after reappearing.
Ice Block now reduces all damage taken by 70% for 6 sec but no longer grants Immunity, prevents movement, attacks, or casting spells. Does not incur the Global Cooldown.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Arcane Surge for 4 sec, Clearcasting, or Time Warp for 6 sec.
Cast Prismatic Barrier on yourself and 4 allies within 40 yds.
Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 271,210 Fire damage.

Blasts the enemy for 155,621 Fire damage. 

Fire: Castable while casting other spells. Always deals a critical strike.
Hurls a Phoenix that deals 90,435 Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to other nearby enemies.
Fire Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 sec.
Phoenix Flames deals 15% increased damage and always critically strikes.

Scorches an enemy for 35,087 Fire damage.

When cast on a target below 30% health, Scorch is a guaranteed critical strike and increases your movement speed by 30% for 3 sec.

Castable while moving.
Pyroblast and Flamestrike's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec and their damage dealt is increased by 5%.

Consuming Hot Streak has a 6% chance to grant you Lit Fuse.

 Lit Fuse:
Your next Fire Blast turns up to 1 nearby target into a Living Bomb that explodes after 1.6 sec, dealing 30,458 Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yds.

Up to 3 enemies hit by this explosion also become a Living Bomb, but this effect cannot spread further.
Increases the maximum number of Fire Blast charges by 2.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.

Your chance of gaining Lit Fuse when consuming Hot Streak is increased by 4%.

Living Bomb damage increased by 50%.
If Phoenix Flames only hits 1 target, it deals 50% increased damage and applies Ignite at 150% effectiveness.
While Ignite is on 3 or fewer enemies it flares up dealing an additional 20% of its damage to affected targets.
Engulfs you in flames for 10 sec, increasing your spells' critical strike chance by 100%. Castable while casting other spells.
Damaging a target with Pyroblast or Fireball increases the damage it receives from Ignite by 0.5%. Stacks up to 50 times.
Flamestrike damage increased by 25%.
Your critical strike damage is increased by 3%. When you activate Combustion, you gain 2% additional critical strike damage, and up to 4 nearby allies gain 1% critical strike for 10 sec.
Combustion grants mastery equal to 75% of your Critical Strike stat and lasts 2 sec longer.
Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames increase your mastery by 4% for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
Flamestrike and Living Bomb apply Mastery: Ignite at 100% increased effectiveness.
Each consecutive critical strike you deal increases critical strike damage you deal by 1%, up to 4% for 6 sec.

Your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch and Phoenix Flames critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown on Combustion by 1.0 sec.

Flamestrike critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown of Combustion by 0.2 sec for each critical strike, up to 1 sec.

When you're not under the effect of Combustion, your critical strike chance is increased by 5.0%.

While you're under the effect of Combustion, your critical strike damage is increased by 5.0%.
Phoenix Flames damage increased by 15% and your direct-damage spells reduce the cooldown of Phoenix Flames by 1 sec.
While Combustion is active, your Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames recharge 50% faster.
Casting Combustion grants Lit Fuse and Living Bomb's damage is increased by 30% while under the effects of Combustion.

When your direct damage spells hit an enemy 25 times, gain 1 stack of Born of Flame. 

 Born of Flame
Phoenix Flames refunds a charge on use and its damage is increased by 200%.

While Combustion is active your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch, and Phoenix Flames deal 70% increased damage and reduce the cooldown of Combustion by 1.25 sec.

While Combustion is active, Flamestrike deals 35% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Combustion by 0.25 sec for each critical strike, up to 1.25 sec.

Lit Fuse now turns up to 3 targets into Living Bombs.

Living Bombs can now spread to 5 enemies.

Every 6 times you cast Arcane Blast or Arcane Barrage, conjure a Spellfire Sphere.

While you're out of combat, you will slowly conjure Spellfire Spheres over time.

 Spellfire Sphere
Increases your spell damage by 1%. Stacks up to 3 times.
Casting Arcane Blast or Arcane Barrage grants you 0.5% Haste for 10 sec. Stacks up to 10 times. Multiple instances may overlap.

When you cast Arcane Surge, summon an Arcane Phoenix to aid you in battle.

  Arcane Phoenix
Your Arcane Phoenix aids you for the duration of your Arcane Surge, casting random Arcane and Fire spells.
Conjuring a Spellfire Sphere increases the damage of your next Arcane Blast by 20% or Arcane Barrage by 20%.
Your Prismatic Barrier now grants 5% avoidance while active and 3% leech for 5 sec when it breaks or expires.
Your Arcane Phoenix will Spellsteal when it is summoned and when it expires.
Consuming Burden of Power causes your next Arcane Barrage to deal 20% increased damage, grant 4 Arcane Charges, and call down a storm of 4 Meteorites at your target.
When you cast Arcane Surge, its duration is extended by 0.5 sec for each Spellfire Sphere you have, up to 2.5 sec.

Over its duration, your Arcane Phoenix will consume each of your Spellfire Spheres to cast an exceptional spell.

Upon consuming a Spellfire Sphere, your Arcane Phoenix will grant you Lingering Embers.

 Lingering Embers
Increases your spell damage by 1%.
Spellfire Spheres can now stack up to 5 times.

While under the effects of a casted Arcane Surge, you gain twice as many stacks of Mana Cascade.

When your Arcane Phoenix expires, it empowers you, granting Arcane Soul for 2 sec, plus an additional 1.0 sec for each exceptional spell it had cast.

Arcane Soul:
Arcane Barrage grants Clearcasting and generates 4 Arcane Charges.

Each cast of Arcane Barrage increases the damage of Arcane Barrage by 15%.

Shields you in flame, absorbing 1.9 million damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take 16,714 Fire damage.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by 60 sec.

When cast on a target below 30% health, Scorch is a guaranteed critical strike and increases your movement speed by 30% for 3 sec.

Pyroblast and Flamestrike's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec and their damage dealt is increased by 5%.
Casting Scorch on targets below 30% health increase the target's damage taken from you by 7% for 12 sec. This effect stacks up to 2 times.
Increases the maximum number of Fire Blast charges by 2.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.

Damaging a target with Pyroblast or Fireball increases the damage it receives from Ignite by 0.5%. Stacks up to 50 times.
Ignite deals 15% more damage and Fireball deals 15% more damage while Combustion is not active. Fire Blast spreads Ignite to 2 additional nearby targets during Combustion.
Your critical strike damage is increased by 3%. When you activate Combustion, you gain 2% additional critical strike damage, and up to 4 nearby allies gain 1% critical strike for 10 sec.
Combustion grants mastery equal to 75% of your Critical Strike stat and lasts 2 sec longer.
Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames increase your mastery by 4% for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

Flamestrike critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown of Combustion by 0.2 sec for each critical strike, up to 1 sec.

Casting Pyroblast or Flamestrike while Hot Streak is active has an 6% chance to repeat the spell cast at 50% effectiveness.

This effect counts as consuming Hot Streak.
Damage dealt to targets below 35% health is increased by 7%.
Phoenix Flames damage increased by 15% and your direct-damage spells reduce the cooldown of Phoenix Flames by 1 sec.
While Combustion is active, your Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames recharge 50% faster.
While Combustion is not active, consuming Hot Streak has a low chance to cause all Pyroblasts and Flamestrikes to have no cast time and be guaranteed critical strikes for 5 sec.

Flamestrike and Living Bomb apply Mastery: Ignite at 100% increased effectiveness.
Each consecutive critical strike you deal increases critical strike damage you deal by 1%, up to 4% for 6 sec.

Your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch and Phoenix Flames critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown on Combustion by 1.0 sec.

Flamestrike critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown of Combustion by 0.2 sec for each critical strike, up to 1 sec.

When you're not under the effect of Combustion, your critical strike chance is increased by 5.0%.

While you're under the effect of Combustion, your critical strike damage is increased by 5.0%.
Phoenix Flames damage increased by 15% and your direct-damage spells reduce the cooldown of Phoenix Flames by 1 sec.
While Combustion is active, your Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames recharge 50% faster.
Casting Combustion grants Lit Fuse and Living Bomb's damage is increased by 30% while under the effects of Combustion.

When your direct damage spells hit an enemy 25 times, gain 1 stack of Born of Flame. 

 Born of Flame
Phoenix Flames refunds a charge on use and its damage is increased by 200%.

While Combustion is active your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch, and Phoenix Flames deal 70% increased damage and reduce the cooldown of Combustion by 1.25 sec.

While Combustion is active, Flamestrike deals 35% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Combustion by 0.25 sec for each critical strike, up to 1.25 sec.

Lit Fuse now turns up to 3 targets into Living Bombs.

Living Bombs can now spread to 5 enemies.
Casting Arcane Blast or Arcane Barrage grants you 0.5% Haste for 10 sec. Stacks up to 10 times. Multiple instances may overlap.

When you cast Arcane Surge, summon an Arcane Phoenix to aid you in battle.

  Arcane Phoenix
Your Arcane Phoenix aids you for the duration of your Arcane Surge, casting random Arcane and Fire spells.
Conjuring a Spellfire Sphere increases the damage of your next Arcane Blast by 20% or Arcane Barrage by 20%.
Your Prismatic Barrier now grants 5% avoidance while active and 3% leech for 5 sec when it breaks or expires.
Your Arcane Phoenix will Spellsteal when it is summoned and when it expires.
Consuming Burden of Power causes your next Arcane Barrage to deal 20% increased damage, grant 4 Arcane Charges, and call down a storm of 4 Meteorites at your target.
When you cast Arcane Surge, its duration is extended by 0.5 sec for each Spellfire Sphere you have, up to 2.5 sec.

Over its duration, your Arcane Phoenix will consume each of your Spellfire Spheres to cast an exceptional spell.

Upon consuming a Spellfire Sphere, your Arcane Phoenix will grant you Lingering Embers.

 Lingering Embers
Increases your spell damage by 1%.
Spellfire Spheres can now stack up to 5 times.

While under the effects of a casted Arcane Surge, you gain twice as many stacks of Mana Cascade.

When your Arcane Phoenix expires, it empowers you, granting Arcane Soul for 2 sec, plus an additional 1.0 sec for each exceptional spell it had cast.

Arcane Soul:
Arcane Barrage grants Clearcasting and generates 4 Arcane Charges.

Each cast of Arcane Barrage increases the damage of Arcane Barrage by 15%.

Shields you with an arcane force, absorbing 1.9 million damage and reducing magic damage taken by 25% for 1 min.

The duration of harmful Magic effects against you is reduced by 40%.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by 10%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by 2%, up to 10% for 8 sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by 30 sec.
Steals a beneficial magic effect from the target. This effect lasts a maximum of 2 min.
Reduces magic damage taken by 4%.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.

Draw power from within, dealing 286,574 Arcane damage over 3.2 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by 12 sec over 3.2 sec.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec. Effect negated by long distance or death.
While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by 4 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by 10 sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer when you return to your original location.

Summons a Ring of Frost for 10 sec at the target location. Enemies entering the ring are incapacitated for 10 sec. Limit 10 targets.

When the incapacitate expires, enemies are slowed by 75% for 4 sec.
Teleports you 20 yds forward, unless something is in the way. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.
Causes an explosion around yourself, dealing 64,012 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds, knocking them back, and reducing movement speed by 80% for 6 sec.
Increases Critical Strike chance by 2%.
Pulses arcane energy around the target enemy or ally, dealing 49,838 Arcane damage to all enemies within 8 yds, and knocking them upward. A primary enemy target will take 100% increased damage.
Increases Haste by 2%.

When your barrier receives melee attacks, you have a 10% chance to be granted Clearcasting. 

Casting your barrier removes all snare effects.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional 10%.
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 40% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.

Enemies hit by Cone of Cold are frozen in place for 5 sec instead of snared.

When your roots expire or are dispelled, your target is snared by 90%, decaying over 3 sec.
Your barrier's cooldown recharges 30% faster while the shield persists.

Makes you invisible and untargetable for 20 sec, removing all threat. Any action taken cancels this effect.

You take 60% reduced damage while invisible and for 3 sec after reappearing.
Ice Block now reduces all damage taken by 70% for 6 sec but no longer grants Immunity, prevents movement, attacks, or casting spells. Does not incur the Global Cooldown.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Arcane Surge for 4 sec, Clearcasting, or Time Warp for 6 sec.
Cast Prismatic Barrier on yourself and 4 allies within 40 yds.

Only castable when you have Clearcasting.

Launches five waves of Arcane Missiles at the enemy over 2.0 sec, causing a total of 414,599 Arcane damage.
Clearcasting can stack up to 2 additional times.
Consuming Clearcasting increases the damage of your next 2 Arcane Blasts or Arcane Barrages by 20%.

Arcane Missiles channels 20% faster.

Clearcasting makes Arcane Explosion echo for 40% damage.
Arcane Missiles fires 3 additional missiles.
For each Arcane Charge, Arcane Barrage hits 1 additional nearby target for 40% damage.
Casting Arcane Intellect summons a Familiar that attacks your enemies and increases your maximum mana by 10% for 1 hour.

Expend all of your current mana to annihilate your enemy target and nearby enemies for up to 620,449 Arcane damage based on Mana spent. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Generates Clearcasting.

For the next 15 sec, your Mana regeneration is increased by 425% and spell damage is increased by 35%.
Casting a damaging spell has a 5% chance to make your next Arcane Barrage deal 50% increased damage and generate 4 Arcane Charges.
Consuming Arcane Charges increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacks up to 5 times.

Arcane Missiles can now be channeled while moving.

Evocation can be channeled while moving.
Arcane Orb gains 1 additional charge. Arcane Orb damage increased by 15%.
Arcane Barrage deals 15% increased damage per target it hits beyond the first.
Arcane Blast has a 10% chance to generate an additional Arcane Charge. If you were to gain an Arcane Charge while at maximum charges instead gain 10% Arcane damage for 10 sec.

Applies Touch of the Magi to your current target, accumulating 25% of the damage you deal to the target for 12 sec, and then exploding for that amount of Arcane damage to the target and reduced damage to all nearby enemies.

Generates 4 Arcane Charges.
Spells empowered by Nether Precision cause their target to suffer an additional 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.
Clearcasting has a 5% increased chance to proc.

Increases your mana regeneration by 1,500% for 2.4 sec and grants Clearcasting.

While channeling Evocation, your Intellect is increased by 2% every 0.4 sec. Lasts 20 sec.
Your Touch of the Magi now accumulates 25% of the damage you deal.
When a spell consumes Clearcasting, its damage is increased by 10%.
Damaging a target with Arcane Missiles increases the damage they take from Arcane Missiles, Arcane Barrage, and Arcane Blast by 1.0% for 6 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.
Direct damage you deal to enemies affected by Touch of the Magi, causes an explosion that deals 14,233 Arcane damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Every 3 times you consume Clearcasting, gain Aether Attunement.

Aether Attunement:
Your next Arcane Missiles deals 100% increased damage to your primary target and fires at up to 4 nearby enemies dealing 50% increased damage.

Arcane damage dealt is increased based on your current mana, up to 6% at full mana.

Mana Regen is increased based on your current mana, up to 20% when out of mana.
Arcane Barrage deals an additional 100% damage against targets below 35% health.

Damage from Arcane Missiles has a 10% chance to grant you 1 Arcane Charge.

Chance is increased by 15% every time your Arcane Missiles fails to grant you an Arcane Charge.
Each time Arcane Missiles hits an enemy, the damage of your next Arcane Barrage is increased by 5%. This effect stacks up to 20 times.

Your Touch of the Magi now also conjures a spark, causing the damage from your next Arcane Barrage, Arcane Blast, and Arcane Missiles to echo for 100% of their damage.

Upon receiving damage from all three spells, the spark explodes, dealing 453,983 Arcane damage to all nearby enemies.
Arcane Barrage has a 10% chance per Arcane Charge consumed to launch an Arcane Orb in front of you at 100% effectiveness.

When you consume Nether Precision, conjure 2 Arcane Splinters.

Arcane Splinter:
Conjure raw Arcane magic into a sharp projectile that deals 41,413 Arcane damage.

Arcane Splinters embed themselves into their target, dealing 41,413 Arcane damage over 18 sec. This effect stacks.

Casting Arcane Surge conjures 8 Arcane Splinters.

During Arcane Surge, whenever you conjure an Arcane Splinter, you have a 100% chance to conjure an additional Arcane Splinter.
For 8 seconds after being struck by an Arcane Orb, 20% of the direct damage dealt by an Arcane Splinter is also dealt to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Enemies damaged by your Arcane Orb conjure 2 Arcane Splinters, up to 4.

Arcane Orb damage is increased by 10%.
You have 40% increased movement speed during Alter Time and Evocation.

Your Prismatic Barrier can absorb up to 50% more damage based on your missing Health.

Max effectiveness when under 50% health.
Whenever an Embedded Arcane Splinter is removed, it explodes, dealing 11,771 Arcane damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
When your Magi's Spark explodes, you conjure 6 Arcane Splinters.

Gain 2% increased critical strike chance.
Gain 5% increased critical strike damage.
Direct damage from Arcane Splinters has a 2.0% chance to launch an Arcane Orb at 50% effectiveness and increase all damage dealt by Arcane Orb by 10% for 10 sec.

Whenever you have 8 or more active Embedded Arcane Splinters, you automatically cast a Splinterstorm at your target.

Splinterstorm:
Shatter all Embedded Arcane Splinters, dealing their remaining periodic damage instantly.

Conjure an Arcane Splinter for each Splinter shattered, then unleash them all in a devastating barrage, dealing 41,413 Arcane damage to your target for each Splinter in the Splinterstorm.

Cast Prismatic Barrier on yourself and 4 allies within 40 yds.

Quickly fling a shard of ice at the target, dealing 83,433 Frost damage.

Ice Lance damage is tripled against frozen targets.

Launches an orb of swirling ice up to 40 yds forward which deals up to 337,604 Frost damage to all enemies it passes through over 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. Grants 1 charge of Fingers of Frost when it first damages an enemy.

Enemies damaged by the Frozen Orb are slowed by 40% for 3 sec.

Frostbolt has a 15% chance and Frozen Orb damage has a 5% to grant a charge of Fingers of Frost.

Fingers of Frost causes your next Ice Lance to deal damage as if the target were frozen.

Maximum 2 charges.

Unleash a flurry of ice, striking the target 3 times for a total of 210,471 Frost damage. Each hit reduces the target's movement speed by 80% for 1 sec and applies Winter's Chill to the target.

Winter's Chill causes the target to take damage from your spells as if it were frozen.
Multiplies the critical strike chance of your spells against frozen targets by 1.5, and adds an additional 50% critical strike chance.
Frostbolt has a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Flurry and cause your next Flurry to deal 50% increased damage.
Frozen Orb deals an additional 30% damage and its duration is increased by 2 sec.

Your Haste is increased by 8%.

You gain 10% more of the Haste stat from all sources.
Frostbolt and Icicle critical strike damage increased by 20%.
Flurry now has 2 charges.
Frostbolt, Ice Lance, and Flurry deal 15% increased damage.
Frozen Orb increases Ice Lance's damage by 15% for 15 sec.
Whenever you attempt to chill a target, you gain Bone Chilling, increasing spell damage you deal by 0.5% for 8 sec, stacking up to 10 times.
Calls down a series of 7 icy comets on and around the target, that deals up to 451,757 Frost damage to all enemies within 6 yds of its impacts.
Damage from Frostbolt and Flurry increases the damage of your Icicles and Glacial Spike by 4%. Stacks up to 2 times.
Each of your Icicles deals 10% additional damage, and when an Icicle deals damage you have a 5% chance to gain the Fingers of Frost effect.

Accelerates your spellcasting for 25 sec, granting 20% haste and preventing damage from delaying your spellcasts.

Activating Icy Veins summons a water elemental to your side for its duration. The water elemental's abilities grant you Frigid Empowerment, increasing the Frost damage you deal by 3%, up to 15%.
Frostbolt and Flurry have a 30% chance to generate 2 Icicles.

Your Comet Storm now applies Numbing Blast, increasing the damage enemies take from you by 6% for 6 sec.

Additionally, Flurry has a 25% chance each hit to call down an icy comet, crashing into your target and nearby enemies for 38,691 Frost damage.
Frozen Orb makes Blizzard instant cast and increases its damage done by 60% for 12 sec.

Icy Veins' duration is increased by 5 sec.

Your Ice Lances against frozen targets extend your Icy Veins by an additional 0.5 sec.

Your Ice Lance and Icicles now deal 5% increased damage, and hit a second nearby target for 90% of their damage.

Your Glacial Spike also hits a second nearby target for 100% of its damage.
Your Ice Lances against frozen targets increase the damage of your Ice Lances by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
While Icy Veins is active, your Frostbolts hit up to 2 additional targets and their damage is increased by 15%.
Casting Ice Lance on Frozen targets has a 100% chance to generate an Icicle.
Casting 30 Frostbolts or Flurries calls down a Frozen Orb toward your target. Hitting an enemy player counts as double.

Conjures a massive spike of ice, and merges your current Icicles into it. It impales your target, dealing 755,307 damage plus all of the damage stored in your Icicles, and freezes the target in place for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the freeze effect.

Requires 5 Icicles to cast.

Passive: Ice Lance no longer launches Icicles.
